alternateName: Analyzing Sentiments and Trends: Insights from YouTube Comments

license.name: Database: Open Database, Contents: Database Contents

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Youtube Comments Dataset dataset

distribution.name: YoutubeCommentsDataSet.csv
distribution.description:
Introducing the Youtube Comments Dataset.csv, a fully cleaned and preprocessed collection of YouTube video comments. This dataset is ideal for sentiment analysis, natural language processing, and text-based machine learning projects. With all irrelevant data already removed and cleaning steps thoroughly performed, it provides clean, structured information, allowing you to focus solely on insights and analysis.


**Potential Tasks:**
**Sentiment Analysis:** Classify comments into positive, negative, or neutral sentiment.
**Text Classification:** Categorize comments based on themes or topics.
**Trend Analysis:** Identify popular topics, phrases, or keywords across multiple videos.
**User Behavior Analysis:** Analyze engagement and tone of comments over time.
**Topic Modeling:** Discover hidden topics in user comments using techniques like LDA.

field.name: Comment
field.description: The text of each YouTube video comment.

field.name: Sentiment
field.description: The sentiment classification of each comment (Positive, Negative, or Neutral).
